response.original_title: Ukraine's Musical Freedom Fighters with Clive Myrie
response.overview: Clive Myrie travels across Ukraine to meet musicians who are preparing to leave their families in their war-torn country in order to create an orchestra and perform at the Royal Albert Hall. With only ten days to rehearse, can they succeed in their ambition to fight the war with their music, instead of with guns? And will the concerts touch the world in the way that they hope?
response.title: Ukraine's Musical Freedom Fighters with Clive Myrie
